BERKSHIRE HATHAWAY INC. Information Regarding Second Quarter Earnings Release FOR IMMEDIATE RELEASE July 30, 2025 Omaha, NE (BRK.A; BRK.B) – Berkshire Hathaway Inc.’s second quarter earnings release and its quarterly report on Form 10-Q will be posted on the Internet on Saturday, August 2, 2025, at approximately 7:00 a.m. Central time where it can be accessed at www.berkshirehathaway.com. About Berkshire Berkshire Hathaway and its subsidiaries engage in diverse business activities including insurance and reinsurance, utilities and energy, freight rail transportation, manufacturing, services and retailing. Common stock of the company is listed on the New York Stock Exchange, trading symbols BRK.A and BRK.B.
